sense.def:
Fluff
so majhni kosmi mehke, lahke niti; naberejo se na oblačilih ali v zaprašenih kotih sobe.

seg.quote: He brushed some fluff from his jacket.

sense.def:
To fluff something
ali
to fluff something out
pomeni nekaj stresti ali skrtačiti, da je videti večje in lažje.

seg.quote: She fluffed her hair out in big waves.
